coded_answer.p: I am writing to you in reply ofto ouryour letter, thatwhich had let me know I am the winner of the first prize ofin your competition.
First of all, I am very happy to spentspend two weeks at Camp California in the USA. Yet, I could only travel in July because I am a student and so my holidays begin onin July.

In addition, I would rather sleep in a tent since I like being nearclose to nature and, especially, singing birds. Thus, I enjoy sports and I would like to practicepractisego swimming and climbing. I am not too bad at these sports.
To conclude, will you kindly let myme know if I need some money and what sort of clothes I should bring with me.

This year, our English class has decided to make a short video about daily life at our school. (It is a graduate engineerengineering school where we are studying mecanicsmechanics and energetics.) That is why we have to single out wichwhich lessons and other activities should be filmed.

On one handOn the one hand, we should be interested in the lessons. At firstFirst, the research and design courseslessons are exitingexciting since we are studying how cars are built. Secondly, we should interview the teacher of heat transferttransfer since his courseslessons are rallyreally breathtaking. That seems to be quite surprising, yet this teacher manages to convey his knowledge.

On the other hand, we should be interested in the other activities such as sports, wichwhich could appeal to more students in our school. For example, our basketball team has won a local championship.
To conclude, in this short video, we must show that thanks to our school we are able to make comebring out the best ofin ourselves.
